      Methods in gov.nih.nlm.bioscores.core with parameters of type Document 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void GenericCoreferencePipeline.analyze​(Document doc, SentenceSegmenter segmenter)
      Segments text into sentences and performs core NLP analysis.
      static void ExpressionRecognition.annotate​(Document doc)
      Annotates a Document with coreferential mentions, reads the types to consider come from the configuration.
      static SemanticItem CoreferenceUtils.closerWithSameOntology​(Document doc, SurfaceElement su, SemanticItem si)
      Finds a semantic object that has the same ontological mapping as another one, but is closer to a given textual unit.
      static void GenericCoreferencePipeline.coreferenceResolution​(Document doc)
      Resolves coreference in a single document.
      static void GenericCoreferencePipeline.coreferentialMentionDetection​(Document doc)
      Detects coreferential mentions in a document.
      static void GenericCoreferencePipeline.generateCoreferenceChain​(Document doc, SurfaceElementChain chain)
      Adds a CoreferenceChain object to the document, given the textual units involved in it.
      static CoreferenceSemanticItemFactory ExpressionRecognition.getCoreferenceSemanticItemFactory​(Document doc)
      Gets a semantic item factory associated with a Document object, capable of generating Expression objects.
      static void GenericCoreferencePipeline.linguisticPreProcessing​(Document doc)
      Transforms document dependency graph to reflect semantic dependencies, useful for this pipeline, and performs coordination recognition.
      static void GenericCoreferencePipeline.mentionReferentLinking​(Document doc)
      Links coreferential mentions to their referents and generates CoreferenceChain objects.
      CoreferenceChain CoreferenceSemanticItemFactory.newCoreferenceChain​(Document doc, RelationAnnotation rel)
      Creates a new CoreferenceChain from an existing standoff RelationAnnotation object.

      Creates a new CoreferenceChain object from a list or arguments.

      Creates a new Expression object from type and textual unit information.
      Expression CoreferenceSemanticItemFactory.newExpression​(Document doc, TermAnnotation t)
      Creates a new Expression object from an existing standoff TermAnnotation object.

      Creates a new Expression object from type and span information.
      Expression CoreferenceSemanticItemFactory.newExpression​(Document doc, java.lang.String type, SurfaceElement se)
      Creates a new Expression object from type and textual unit information.
      static void CoreferenceResolver.processDocumentForAnaphora​(Document doc, java.util.List<SurfaceElementChain> anaphoraLinks)
      Processes the entire document for anaphora chains.

      Processes the entire document for appositive chains.

      static void CoreferenceResolver.processDocumentForPredicateNominative​(Document doc, java.util.List<SurfaceElementChain> predNomLinks)
      Processes the entire document for predicate nominative chains.
      static void GenericCoreferencePipeline.pruneCoreferenceChains​(Document doc)
      Prunes anaphoric chains in which the mention is also involved in a cataphoric chain.
      static void GenericCoreferencePipeline.segmentSections​(Document doc)
      Segments the document into sections, using the default section segmenter
      static void GenericCoreferencePipeline.segmentSections​(Document doc, SectionSegmenter segmenter)
      Segments the document into sections, if a SectionSegmenter is provided.

      SurfaceElement SurfaceElementFactory.createSurfaceElementIfNecessary​(Document doc, SpanList sp, boolean gapped)
      Same as SurfaceElementFactory.createSurfaceElementIfNecessary(Document, SpanList, SpanList, boolean), except it computes the head as well.

      static java.util.LinkedHashSet<SurfaceElement> Document.getOntologyMatches​(Document doc, SurfaceElement surf)
      Given a textual unit, finds all conceptually equivalent textual units within the document
      static java.util.LinkedHashSet<SemanticItem> Document.getOntologyMatches​(Document doc, SemanticItem sem)
      Given a semantic item, finds all conceptually equivalent semantic items within the document

      Gets semantic items associated with a semantic class (Entity, Event, etc.).

      Finds all semantic items of a given semantic class in a given text span.

      Finds all semantic items of a given semantic class and a given list of semantic types.

      Similar to getSemanticItemsByClassType(Document, Class, List), but also filters by text span and may allow overlap.
      static java.util.LinkedHashSet<SemanticItem> Document.getSemanticItemsBySpan​(Document doc, SpanList sp, boolean allowOverlap)
      Finds all semantic items, regardless of class, within a text span.
